Introduction

Bian, formerly known as Jiwon, is a South Korean singer, dancer, model and BJ. She was a member of the girl group MAJORS and a former member of ANS and MIDNIGHT.
On May 25, 2022, ANS Entertainment shares that Bian hasn't officially left the group but is in an indefinite hiatus due to health/personal reasons.
